mapper.select: SELECT NVL((SELECT 1 FROM member WHERE member_name=#{memberName} AND member_phone=#{memberPhone}), 0) AS result FROM dual
SELECT NVL((SELECT 1 FROM member WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND member_email=#{memberEmail}), 0) AS result FROM dual
SELECT NVL((SELECT 1 FROM member WHERE member_id=#{memberId}), 0) AS result FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_id, member_passwd, member_name, member_phone, member_email, member_addr1, member_addr2, member_addr3, member_regdate) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{memberPasswd}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAddr1}, #{memberAddr2}, #{memberAddr3}, SYSDATE)
